thread.title: St Etienne fans to be given police escort to Old Trafford for Manchester United clash
thread.title_full: St Etienne fans to be given police escort to Old Trafford for Manchester United clash

author: Martin Domin
title: St Etienne fans to be given police escort to Old Trafford for Manchester United clash
text:
St Etienne fans to be given police escort to Old Trafford for Manchester United clash The French supporters have travelled for their side's Europa League clash with Manchester United Share St. Etienne take on Manchester United tonight (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
St Etienne fans will be given a police escort when they head to Old Trafford tonight. 
The French supporters have travelled for their side's Europa League last 16 clash with Manchester United . 
And police are closing main roads in the city centre and Salford. 
Fans have been gathering in Manchester this afternoon as European football returns after the winter break. 
St Etienne won just two of their group games and finished five points behind Lazio. 
United also finished second, a point behind Fenerbahce. 
The return leg takes place in France next Wednesday. Manchester United host the Europa League clash (Photo: John Peters) Like us on Facebook
